name: netpbm

variants.name: ghostscript
variants.description: Ghostscript is called by pstopnm and pbmtextps

variants.name: builtin
variants.description: Use builtin libs instead of 3rd party

description:
Netpbm - graphics tools and converters. A whole bunch of utilities for
primitive manipulation of graphic images. Wide array of converters from
one graphics format to another. E.g. from g3 fax format to jpeg. Many
basic graphics editing tools such as magnifying and cropping.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg is a widely used free library with functions for handling the
JPEG image data format. It implements a JPEG codec (encoding and
decoding) alongside various utilities for handling JPEG data.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: ghostscript
dependencies.description: An interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependencies.name: jbigkit
dependencies.description:
JBIG-Kit is a software implementation of the JBIG1 data compression
standard.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependent_to.name: latex2html
dependent_to.description:
LaTeX2HTML is a utility that converts LaTeX documents to web pages in
HTML.
